materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph of a snowy landscape in Murree, Punjab. On the left of the photograph, there is a road along the hill, bordered by a fence. There is a roof buikding in the center. In the background, there is a hilly landscape of houses interspersed with trees.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Murree, Punjab
subject_terms_1: snow (precipitation) winter scenery (landscape) mountains hill settlements
subject_terms_2: Photographs Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Murree (Pakistan) Landscape photography Snow Winter Mountains
